title: NYC Set for Weekend Snow as Central US Preps for Arctic Cold
description: New York City and parts of New Jersey could see the first significant snow of the winter season, as a blast of frigid Canadian air pushes across the central and eastern US.
content: New York City and parts of New Jersey could see the first significant snow of the winter season, as a blast of frigid Canadian air pushes across the central and eastern US.
